ygData.subject: Re: FULL LIST OF NEW ITEMS
ygData.msgSnippet: When I mentioned lupine I actually was referring to werewolf armor which can be gotten from werewolves or from werewolf parts taken to Karg in the hinterlands.
ygData.messageBody:
When I mentioned lupine I actually was referring to werewolf armor
which can be gotten from werewolves or from werewolf parts taken to
Karg in the hinterlands.

--- Tim Borelli <timb@...> wrote:
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
>
> >
> >Is there any truth to that rumor about making a
> skull staff? I have
> >never seen one on E'ci. What's the story here
> folks?
>
> i keep hearing there is a quest for it, and the guy
> (who i have seen) that
> you go to after you get the quest is in S. Ro with
> an orc pet.
>
> >
> >As far as armor, there is better than woven, if you
> have the money or
> >ability to get it yourself. Gossimer and Damask
> are better than woven
> >in the cloth department.
>
> damask isnt better than woven from what i see. it
> weighs more and has the
> same AC, unless it absorbs damage better?
>
> There are also mage-usable leather varieties
> >such as bear-hide and lupine. I don't know where
> to get it, but bone
> >armor is available from some mobs out in the
> Karanas.
>
> the bone armor is on the ogres at their camp in west
> karana. they are tough
> tho, all of them are amiable to you except their
> chief, who will KOS. they
> blue to red to me at lvl 21. the bear and lupine
> hide stuff you can get in
> qeynos hills from some poachers that the druids
> hate. chandra miller and
> baobob miller. give them what they ask for (bear
> hides, wolf hides) and
> some gold, and they'll give you the armor.
>
> >
> >For a one handed weapon, the new hot item is
> Dvinn's dagger, the
> >Dragoon Dirk. If you aren't capable of doing Dvinn
> yourself get a big
> >group that will dommit to staying through enough
> spawns to get one for
> >everyone. He is in the neighborhood of level 20
> but hits much harder
> >than the average bear. Go to Crushbone and see
> what you can do.
> >
>
> he's just like Dorn in N. Ro. get a group of 4 or 5
> lvl 17-20 people, with
> a good cleric, and he's toast. =)
>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st lvl
> enchanter on Cazic-Thule
> -------------------
> tim borrelli
> computer character animator and crackhead
> extraordinaire
> Volition, Inc.
